verbose_text: All of these suggest that TLR2 is involved in Lactobacillus induced macrophages in huREG3gamma tgIEC mice and meanwhile also indicate that Lactobacillus NK318.1 may directly activate STAT3 signal pathway.
evidence: TLR2 is involved in Lactobacillus-induced macrophages in huREG3gamma tgIEC  mice and meanwhile also indicate that Lactobacillus NK318.1 may directly activate STAT3
